title: Uncle
creator_contributor_role: VCA Film and Television School, University of Melbourne, production company
abstract: Moving tribute to suburban eccentricity and family loyalty.
description: An award-winning short about a favoured Uncle who was a thoroughly ordinary and a thoroughly decent man. Peppered with wryly comic remembrances of a seventies childhood, 'Uncle' is a moving tribute to suburban eccentricity and familial loyalty.
